name: Find and Replace
description:
Search for texts on your page and replace them just like a text editor.


You can search for objects on your page by either text content or layer name. Click on the ... button next to each section to display more settings.


Keyboard shortcuts

When focused on "Find":

  • Enter: Go to next result
  • ⇧ Enter: Go to previous result


When focused on "Replace with":

  • Enter: Replace then go to next result
  • ⌘ Enter: Replace all


Esc: Close plugin


Use Find and Replace in Quick Actions

  1. Open Quick Actions (⌘ + / )
  2. Look for "Find and Replace" (but don't run it yet)
  3. Press the Tab key
  4. Enter your search term and hit Enter to start searching
